metadata.description: Location of the Cluster
Name of your cluster - Between 3 and 23 characters. Letters and numbers only
TCP Client Connection end point to perform management operations on this cluster
Http Client Connection end point to perform management operations on this cluster
Remote desktop user Id
Remote desktop user password. Must be a strong password
Part of the health policy - This specifies the maximum % of applications that can be unhealthy before the aggregated health is calculated as Error.

Part of the health policy - This specifies the maximum % of Nodes that can be unhealthy before the aggregated health is calculated as Error. In large clusters, there will always be nodes down or out for repairs, so this percentage should be configured to tolerate that.
Part of the health policy - This specifies the maximum % of application instances in the cluster that can turn unhealthy during an upgrade before the upgrade is rolled back.
Part of the health policy - This specifies the maximum % of Nodes in the cluster that can turn unhealthy during an upgrade before the upgrade is rolled back.
Part of the health policy - This specifies the maximum % of Nodes in each upgrade domain that can turn unhealthy during an upgrade before the upgrade is rolled back.
Input endpoint1 for the application to use. Replace it with what your application uses
Input endpoint2 for the application to use. Replace it with what your application uses
The store name where the cert will be deployed in the virtual machine
Certificate Thumbprint
Resource Id of the key vault, is should be in the format of /subscriptions/<Sub ID>/resourceGroups/<Resource group name>/providers/Microsoft.KeyVault/vaults/<vault name>
Refers to the location URL in your key vault where the certificate was uploaded, it is should be in the format of https://<name of the vault>.vault.azure.net:443/secrets/<exact location>
Protection level.Three values are allowed - EncryptAndSign, Sign, None. It is best to keep the default of EncryptAndSign, unless you have a need not to
Replication option for the VM image storage account
Replication option for the support log storage account
